page.title: 08Petit Catelet Farm, St.John
page.content: Mr. Romeril has owned this farm for 25 years. It has been a farm for 2OO years. Here is a typical timetable:- 6.OO He milks the cows. 7.3O The cows put outside, stables cleaned. 8.OO He works in the fields. 12.OO Lunch. 13.OO Work in the fields. 16.OO Milking time but in the high season from 18.OO-2O.OO Work in the fields. In the fields are potatoes,cauliflowers, grass, maize, sugarbeet and kale. His livestock consists of cows, bulls,pigs and chickens. Machinery consists of tractors, ploughs,rotavators,trailers, fertilizer distributors and potato planters.He became a farmer because he likes animals and outside work. There must be a future in farming because as the world grows more food is required.
